title: [Game] Beginner's Guide - Everything New Players Need to Know
description: Create comprehensive tutorials for new players covering basic mechanics, essential strategies, common mistakes to avoid, and progression tips. Include visual demonstrations and clear explanations.

title: Master [Character/Class] in [Game] - Advanced Guide
description: Provide in-depth tutorials for specific characters or classes, including advanced combos, situational strategies, matchup knowledge, and optimization techniques for experienced players.

title: [Game] Settings Optimization - FPS and Performance Guide
description: Show how to optimize game settings for best performance, including graphics options, keybinds, sensitivity settings, and hardware-specific configurations for competitive advantage.

title: From [Rank] to [Higher Rank] - [Game] Ranked Guide
description: Provide specific strategies for climbing ranked ladders, including mindset tips, mechanical improvements, game knowledge, and common mistakes that prevent ranking up.

title: [Game] Economy Guide - Managing Resources Like a Pro
description: Explain in-game economy systems, resource management, optimal spending strategies, and how to maximize value from limited resources in competitive scenarios.

title: [Specific Mechanic] Tutorial - [Game] Advanced Techniques
description: Focus on specific advanced mechanics like animation canceling, frame traps, or complex combos. Break down inputs, timing, and practical applications in real gameplay.

title: [Game] Map Guide - Callouts, Angles, and Positioning
description: Provide comprehensive map knowledge including callouts, common angles, positioning strategies, and how to use map features to gain competitive advantages.

title: Counter [Strategy/Character] - [Game] Defense Guide
description: Teach players how to counter popular strategies, overpowered characters, or meta builds. Include specific techniques, timing, and alternative approaches.

title: [Game] Aim Training - Improve Your Accuracy
description: Provide aim training routines, sensitivity guides, crosshair placement tips, and practice methods to improve shooting accuracy and reaction time.

title: [Game] Team Communication - Callouts and Coordination
description: Teach effective team communication including clear callouts, strategic coordination, leadership roles, and how to maintain positive team dynamics during matches.

title: [Game] Build Guide - [Character/Role] Optimization
description: Explain optimal builds, skill trees, equipment choices, and stat distributions for specific characters or roles. Include situational variations and reasoning behind choices.

title: [Game] Movement Guide - Advanced Mobility Techniques
description: Teach advanced movement mechanics including bunny hopping, slide canceling, wall running, or other mobility techniques that provide competitive advantages.

title: [Game] Meta Analysis - Current Best Strategies
description: Analyze the current meta game including strongest characters, popular strategies, win rates, and how to adapt playstyle to current competitive trends.

title: [Game] Mistake Analysis - Common Errors and Fixes
description: Identify common mistakes players make at different skill levels and provide specific solutions. Include gameplay examples and before/after comparisons.

title: [Game] Hotkeys and Macros - Efficiency Guide
description: Optimize keybindings, create useful macros, and establish efficient control schemes that improve reaction time and reduce mechanical barriers to performance.

title: [Game] Psychology Guide - Mental Game Mastery
description: Address the mental aspects of gaming including tilt management, confidence building, pressure handling, and maintaining focus during competitive matches.

title: [Game] Farming Guide - Resource and XP Optimization
description: Show efficient methods for farming experience, currency, or resources. Include route optimization, time management, and risk/reward analysis.

title: [Game] Situational Guide - Adapting to Different Scenarios
description: Teach players how to adapt their playstyle to different game situations, including comeback scenarios, advantage states, and clutch situations.
